arg.name: use_sim_time
arg.description: Use the /clock topic for time to sync with simulation

arg.name: control_type
arg.description: Fleet adapter type: full_control or read_only

arg.name: fleet_name
arg.description: Name of the fleet that this adapter will interface with

arg.name: nav_graph_file
arg.description: The file path of this fleet's navigation graph

arg.name: linear_velocity
arg.description: The nominal linear velocity of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: angular_velocity
arg.description: The nominal angular velocity of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: linear_acceleration
arg.description: The nominal linear acceleration of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: angular_acceleration
arg.description: The nominal angular acceleration of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: footprint_radius
arg.description: The radius of the footprint of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: vicinity_radius
arg.description: The radius of the personal vicinity of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: perform_deliveries
arg.description: Whether this fleet adapter can perform deliveries

arg.name: delay_threshold
arg.description: How long to wait before replanning

arg.name: disable_delay_threshold
arg.description: Disable the delay_threshold behavior

arg.name: retry_wait
arg.description: How long a retry should wait before starting

arg.name: discovery_timeout
arg.description: How long to wait on discovery before giving up

arg.name: reversible
arg.description: Can the robot drive backwards

arg.name: perform_loop
arg.description: Whether this fleet adapter can perform loops

arg.name: perform_cleaning
arg.description: Whether this fleet adapter can perform cleaning

arg.name: battery_voltage
arg.description: The nominal voltage(V) of the battery in the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: battery_capacity
arg.description: The nominal capacity(Ah) of the battery in the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: battery_charging_current
arg.description: The nominal charging current(A) of the battery in the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: mass
arg.description: The mass(kg) of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: inertia
arg.description: The inertia(kg.m^2) of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: friction_coefficient
arg.description: The friction coefficient of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: ambient_power_drain
arg.description: The power rating(W) of ambient devices (processors, sensors, etc.) of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: tool_power_drain
arg.description: The power rating(W) of special tools (vaccuum, cleaning systems, etc.) of the vehicles in this fleet

arg.name: drain_battery
arg.description: Whether battery drain should be considered while assigning tasks to vechiles in this fleet

arg.name: recharge_threshold
arg.description: The fraction of total battery capacity below which the robot must return to its charger

arg.name: experimental_lift_watchdog_service
arg.description: (Experimental) The name of a service to check whether a robot can enter a lift
